definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: They're evenly spaced in this model.
sentences.chinese: 它們均等地分隔在這個模型中。

sentences.english: Odds have evened between the champions.
sentences.chinese: 爭奪冠軍的兩名選手得勝的機會均等。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道損害可以在芯片上用均等化來減輕。

sentences.english: China was a society with high equality before the reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放以前我國是一個均等化程度較高的社會。

sentences.english: We gave each of the five children an equal share.
sentences.chinese: 我們給了這五個孩子每人均等的一份。

sentences.english: This will also introduce "equal opportunity" to high-quality English learning.
sentences.chinese: 他還將“機會均等”介紹給高質量的英語學習者。

sentences.english: The principle of compensation is a central element in the principle of equalisation of opportunities in Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 補償原則是丹麥的機會均等原則之中的一個核心元素。

sentences.english: When we went to chats together everyone had equal time to converse.
sentences.chinese: 當我們一起聊天的時候每個人都有均等的發言的機會。

sentences.english: Of course all the familiar principles of fairness and equal opportunity still matter.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們熟悉的公平以及機會均等的法則依然奏效。

sentences.english: Fourth, we will steadily promote equal access for all to basic public health services.
sentences.chinese: 四是促進基本公共衛生服務逐步均等化。

sentences.english: Which spinner gives Kathy and Kym an equal chance of winning?
sentences.chinese: 哪一個轉盤他們兩個贏的機會是均等的？

sentences.english: The goal of all this is what we call "equal opportunity activism."
sentences.chinese: 所有這些的目標被我們稱爲“機會均等運動”。

sentences.english: China has yet to launch an equal-opportunity school for male gold-diggers.
sentences.chinese: 中國還沒有開設一所爲拜金男提供均等機會的學校。

sentences.english: What it actually guarantees is the equal distribution of session affinities among servant regions.
sentences.chinese: 它實際保證的是會話關聯在服務區域之間的均等分配。

sentences.english: This will also introduce “equal opportunity” to high-quality English learning. It’s on the Net.
sentences.chinese: 他還將“機會均等”介紹給高質量的英語學習者。

definition: equal to/having the same social class or status
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
one divides into two/to be two-sided/there are two sides to everything/to see both sb's good points and shortcomings (idiom)
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
